Instruction: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat (around 400Â°F).
Peel the papaya, remove the seeds, and slice it into wedges.
In a small bowl, mix together chili powder, lime juice, honey, and a pinch of salt.
Brush the chili lime sauce over the papaya wedges.
Grill the papaya wedges for 2-3 minutes per side, or until grill marks appear and the papaya is slightly caramelized.
Remove the grilled papaya from the grill and transfer them to a serving plate.
Drizzle any remaining chili lime sauce over the grilled papaya.
Serve the grilled papaya hot as a unique and flavorful side dish.
